website_summaries.verdict: You'll wish it was summer all year round, at least for a few hours a day. These gladiator-style sandals get compliments on almost everyone, with almost any style. Just don't plan on running a marathon.
pros: Gladiator-style sandals that look good even on short legs
The ties make for an adjustable fit
Comes in a variety of colors
Lace-up design with an open toe and caged silhouette

customer_reviews.title: They were okay but...
customer_reviews.text: I thought these fit true to size. I didn't like the cut of the sole's toe area. It didn't look good with my toes. I also didn't like the bare opening (gap) between the toe strap and the first set of ankle strap. They seemed to be a good quality but I found another pair of gladiator sandals that I liked better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a recent vacation and assumed they would be something I would wear once or twice in the evening. Well, I put them on and they felt and looked so amazing that I wore them the whole trip. They really look great with everything from jeans to dresses, and I was complimented several times on my "cute shoes." Do yourself a favor and buy these shoes. They are on point style-wise and they look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gigigemm

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but require some break in.
customer_reviews.text: My friend has these and swears that they are her most comfortable sandals, so I bought a pair. They aren't bad, but the straps are still a little stiff. I'm hoping they loosen up after a few wearings. The footbed is not really padded very much, so I wouldn't wear them for a full day of walking. Very cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: The best sandal for summer!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sandal. It is so freaking amazing. Aesthetically pleasing and super cute. I actually had them in 2017 but Sam Edelman discontinued them and I have been looking for this pair for a while. So happy I found them!!
customer_reviews.author: ds

customer_reviews.title: Wide width is too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these sandals. However, even the wide width is very narrow. Not only are they too narrow, but the sandals make my feet look even wider. Also, there's a weird open space which is too large between the straps that criss cross by the toes and the part where the laces begin. Returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Mischka

customer_reviews.title: they are comfortable and I like the fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear between a 7 and 7 1/2 in shoes and got these in a size 7. I would say they seemed a little snug at the beginning and I was debating about returning them for a larger size but after wearing them around the house, they are comfortable and I like the fit. They are super cute and go with just about anything!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Sizing vary among colors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in the putty color (twice, once in store and once on amazon), in a size 8M and they are great. However, then I bought the same exact size in Golden caramel suede, but they fit like a completely different shoe. They are super small around the toe for my feet and the laces are also much shorter. It's been more than a month since I bought them (since I didn't think I needed to try them on for size), so now I cannot return them either.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! Only reason I'm not giving them 5 stars is because on one of the sandals the string is not centered and is way longer on one end. I'm not able to adjust it because it's glued (or something) and won't move. When I tie the loop, it is way longer on one side than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for these!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find these shoes in stores or online anymore. Glad Amazon still had them! They’re a little snug initially, but are more comfortable with each wear.
customer_reviews.author: BCMA

customer_reviews.title: Broken shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had tried these on more carefully when I first purchased them. Went to wear them for the first time today and one of the tabs holding the laces to the shoe came right off. Now it's past my return window and I'm stick with a $50 broken shoe that's never been worn. What a shame because the shoe itself is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: JCV

customer_reviews.title: Be mindful when ordering your size.
customer_reviews.text: It's a super cute sandal. I would've given it 5 stars except the descriptions says W (for wide), but the shoe is very narrow. So if you have chubby feet, it doesn't fit right at the top. If I had known that, I would have ordered a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Senia

customer_reviews.title: Hot red sandals
customer_reviews.text: Cutest sandals ever. Get compliments every time I wear these. very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Sam Edelman shoes are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of Sam Edelman shoes. This purchase is replacing a pair I have worn out. I can wear this brand standing all day without a problem. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable and reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of these sandals. I bought three at a department store,red, black and tan because they were so stylish and comfortable and were on sale. Once I saw the ivory on Amazon, and the price, I could not resist. Even when the gladiator look goes out these will still be in because they are classy and not extreme. I highly recommend them for comfort, fit and style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning & true to size!
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! I love the colour and the fit - would highly recommend! I suggest ordering true to size. I paid a great price & feel that they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture on here definitely doesn't do it justice. I was so bummed when I received these because they don't look like the picture nor do they feet your feet well too. I returned them the next day and got my money backn
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Slightly loose around the ankle
customer_reviews.text: These fit a little larger than expected but I still love them! Have been looking for them in my size for a year and I’m so glad I finally found them!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Honney

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, well constructed. Was, however, too busy for me- returned them.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are amazing! They are very comfortable and go with everything
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are amazing! They are very comfortable and go with everything. I am a size 8.5 and these fot true to size
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I’m wheelchair bound so the fact that these are a little large isn’t a big deal. I love the way that they look!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Vichich

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals
customer_reviews.text: Nice sandals. Only complaint is the little metal pieces at the end of the laces sometimes get caught in the sandal and it's a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: rvarn

customer_reviews.title: favorite sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Sam makes a great shoe and whatever the style they always fit my wide feet. I love these so much I may buy another pair for when these wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Jbug

customer_reviews.title: Sell more Sam Edelman sandals
customer_reviews.text: Sam Eldelman is a fantastic designer when he designs his shoes . Definitely thinking of the woman and what would make her look sexy. I love my sandels!
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! I get so many compliments & wear them everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are cute and comfortable! I normally wear a size 7 1/2 to 8, and I ordered an 8. The fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Fit well and will go with a lot of stuff in my closet!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Alley

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoe and orders 1/2 up and does seem ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm unsure of the fit of the shoe and undecided if I should return. I have flat feet and there is no support. I like the shoe and orders 1/2 up and does seem right
customer_reviews.author: tiffany Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, true to size, and cute on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Flowering girl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these sandals! I am an Edelman fan, and couldn't be happier. Great pop of colour, stylish and a super price!
customer_reviews.author: Tilee

customer_reviews.title: True to Size
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sandals. They are cute stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable. Fit my narrow feet very well at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and comfortable. Fit my narrow feet very well at the front. Lovely soft colour that goes well with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and alternative to flip flops
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandals. Received so many compliments and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shoe, couldn't find in any stores. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of San Edelman's collection. Great fit and very comfortable. Highly Recommed
customer_reviews.author: TexasShoeAngel

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandles
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandles!!! They where sold out in the Sam store and everywhere else I tried ! So happy I got them they will be my go to for the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is cute and comfy. what more can a girl ask from a sandal?
customer_reviews.author: Bnme

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Simple
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! The fit was as expected and the style is so trendy. Considering ordering another pair in snakeskin!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Already had them in nude great find and price break on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable sandal ever. Very hip and flattering on. Feels like slippers!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes now. I have them in 2 colors now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these got my 26 yr old daughter. She loves them they were true to size and really make a statement!
customer_reviews.author: Tarheel Runner

customer_reviews.title: they are very comfortable and match with everything
customer_reviews.text: Although they are slightly small, they are very comfortable and match with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compliments...and compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I have three colors of these beauties and I have loved every one of them AND I always get a compliment when I wear them...so what is bad about that!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice quality! Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice quality! Fit as expected! Love them they run true to size I wear a 7 1/2 thats what I ordered Much prettier when you get I got the Jute thinking it was a light cream color it is actually a very soft gold beautiful & thats fine I can wear with everything. Will be ordering another color
customer_reviews.author: betty ewer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Sam Edelman shoes are by far the most comfortable that I've ever worn as far as a sandal or pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kathyd

customer_reviews.title: Adorable shoe. As others have said
customer_reviews.text: Adorable shoe. As others have said, there is some open space at the top of the foot closer to the toes. From my viewpoint looking down, it took a little getting used to. No one I showed them to while on my feet felt the same way though. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these!! More comfortable than expected and cuter than expected. Made well - will be keeping!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl32

customer_reviews.title: Terrific - just not for my big, wide foot
customer_reviews.text: I drooled over these for weeks before ordering them. They are comfortable and cute from the side, but look terrible from the top on my size 9 feet. The problem is that the front straps fit over the toes forward of the widest part of the foot leaving a vast length and width of foot flesh exposed and undecorated in the middle. I still think these are cute for the right feet (shorter, narrower), just not for mine. Thanks to Amazon's return policy, I will find another shoe to drool over and try.
customer_reviews.author: HateToCook

product_meta.title: Sam Edelman Women's Gemma Gladiator Sandals
product_meta.description:
For laid-back style with a Southwestern-inspired twist, slip into Sam Edelman's Gemma sandal. You'll love its mix of snake print leather, suede fringe, and turquoise-colored beads.

Sam Edelman shoes epitomize chic comfort. With exceptional materials and fine styling, each pair of Sam Edelman shoes is an affordable luxury that cleverly combines a youthful outlook with a worldly sensibility. Sophistication with down-to-earth appeal mean that these shoes are made to be lived in. Whether it's a classic revisited for a modern interpretation or a cutting edge design, Sam Edelman shoes always keep an emphasis on comfort.
feature_bullets: Perfect your summery-chic ensemble in these modern Gemma gladiator sandals.

Round toe. Man-made lining and insole. Lightly padded footbed. Micro heel. Man-made sole. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 1⁄2 in Weight: 7 oz Product measurements were taken using size 8, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
